verbs.description: Trump [V: had] said he was interested in holding the historic meeting on the heavily fortified border separating North and South Korea .
[ARG0: Trump] had [V: said] [ARG1: he was interested in holding the historic meeting on the heavily fortified border separating North and South Korea] .
Trump had said [ARG1: he] [V: was] [ARG2: interested in holding the historic meeting on the heavily fortified border separating North and South Korea] .
Trump had said [ARG0: he] was interested in [V: holding] [ARG1: the historic meeting] [ARGM-LOC: on the heavily fortified border separating North and South Korea] .
Trump had said he was interested in holding the historic meeting on [ARG1: the heavily fortified border] [V: separating] [ARG2: North and South Korea] .
